oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Schools; Educational facilities
Education - Tennessee; Education - History - Tennessee; School buildings - Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Two-story building of crab orchard stone identified as Crossville High School. Two cars are parked in the front drive. The image is a pictre postcard.
This building was probably built in the late 1920s, the first class was held in 1931.
